Articles.Content:
Whats a KSAT? a Killer Sat. By now your getting tired of these screenshots, but hey, i get bored easily.

4 Six barreled 30 MM Sea Whiz guns with 40k rounds Each! (SHOWN FIRING) ((DUH)) After ammo is depleted, simply detonate the reactor and BOOOM! No Tech left for an enemy to salvage!

Corporal Vasquez

USCSM KSCSM 8th BMTS Sulaco.
